response.original_title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
response.overview: One year later, Michael Myers' traumatized young niece is horrified to discover she has a telepathic bond with her evil uncle... and that he is on the way back to Haddonfield to begin the carnage again.
response.tagline: Michael lives. AND THIS TIME THEY'RE READY!
response.title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
